EmailTemplate.name: Pre-program presenter information pack
EmailTemplate.subject: Presenter Information for {!Job__c.Open_course_program_name__c} on {!Job__c.Certificate_Date_Text__c} in {!Job__c.Venue_City__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
CC Ian
Hi {!Job__c.Facilitator_1__c}
Please find attached the following information, to help you prepare for {!Job__c.Certificate_Date_Text__c} open course.
PFQ Excerpt – groups the objectives, shortcomings and difficult aspects as indicated by participants. PFQ Summary - includes most relevant information from the PFQ responses. Confidence and Competence Graph (refer to PFQ summary spreadsheet – worksheet titled: Conf_Comp) for group. Pax List – quick overview of participants including highlights of those who haven’t completed pre-work. Leaders Guide timetable Open Course Code of Practice Peer Review Form - As part of the ENS Quality Assurance, please complete the attached ENS Peer/Self Review form after the workshop and return to me. (Solo facilitators will complete a self-assessment and dual facilitators will peer review each other)
Venue {!Job__c.Venue_Name__c} {!Job__c.Venue_Address__c} {!Job__c.Venue_Contact__c}
Materials and case studies include: Fundamentals Handbooks (and pens) Green Recourses / Seamless Enterprises Level 1 Workbook set (4 cards and pen) Crocodile eggs Red/Blue process observation sheet Process observation sheet Level 2 Manual set (4 cards and pen) Harbourside/Munal Garden Block Process observation sheet Level 3 Advanced Workbook set (4 cards and pen) Process observation sheet 3 recommendations Garden Block Customer Reluctance Sino Oil
Program timetable 0830 - 0845 Coffee/Tea – Meet and Greet 0845 - 1030 Morning Session 1030 - 1045 Coffee/Tea Break 1045 - 1230 Morning Session continues 1230 - 1330 Lunch 1330 - 1530 Afternoon Session 1530 - 1545 Coffee/Tea Break 1545 - 1715 Afternoon Session continues
The materials will be arriving on XXX
Let me know if you need anything else.
Kind regards
